info.name: User Resource
info.description: Verifies that commonly-used routines for interacting with User data are working as expected. Most of these are related to filtering operations and for back-end use only.

item.name: Get Users Include Anon and Default User

request.description:
### GET /api/v1/users/filter

This endpoint retrieves a list of users based on specified filters.

#### Request

- Method: GET
- URL: `{{serverURL}}/api/v1/users/filter`
- Query Parameters:
    - per_page (optional): The number of users to be included per page.
    - includeanonymous (optional): Indicates whether to include anonymous users in the response.
    - includedefault (optional): Indicates whether to include default users in the response.

#### Response

The response is in JSON format and follows the schema below:

``` json
{
  "entity": [
    {
      "active": true,
      "actualCompanyId": "",
      "additionalInfo": {},
      "admin": true,
      "backendUser": true,
      "birthday": 0,
      "comments": null,
      "companyId": "",
      "createDate": 0,
      "deleteDate": null,
      "deleteInProgress": true,
      "emailAddress": "",
      "emailaddress": "",
      "failedLoginAttempts": 0,
      "female": true,
      "firstName": "",
      "frontendUser": true,
      "fullName": "",
      "gravitar": "",
      "hasConsoleAccess": true,
      "id": "",
      "languageId": "",
      "lastLoginDate": null,
      "lastLoginIP": null,
      "lastName": "",
      "male": true,
      "middleName": "",
      "modificationDate": 0,
      "name": "",
      "nickname": null,
      "passwordExpirationDate": null,
      "passwordExpired": true,
      "passwordReset": true,
      "timeZoneId": "",
      "type": "",
      "userId": ""
    }
  ],
  "errors": [],
  "i18nMessagesMap": {},
  "messages": [],
  "pagination": {
    "currentPage": 0,
    "perPage": 0,
    "totalEntries": 0
  },
  "permissions": []
}

 ```

### GET /api/v1/users/loginAsData

This endpoint retrieves user data with the option to specify the number of entries per page.

#### Request

- Method: GET
- URL: `{{serverURL}}/api/v1/users/loginAsData?per_page=40`

#### Response

The response is a JSON object with the following schema:

```json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "entity": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "active": { "type": "boolean" },
          "actualCompanyId": { "type": "string" },
          "additionalInfo": { "type": "object" },
          "admin": { "type": "boolean" },
          "backendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "birthday": { "type": "null" },
          "comments": { "type": "null" },
          "companyId": { "type": "string" },
          "createDate": { "type": "number" },
          "deleteDate": { "type": "null" },
          "deleteInProgress": { "type": "boolean" },
          "emailAddress": { "type": "string" },
          "emailaddress": { "type": "string" },
          "failedLoginAttempts": { "type": "number" },
          "female": { "type": "boolean" },
          "firstName": { "type": "string" },
          "frontendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "fullName": { "type": "string" },
          "gravitar": { "type": "string" },
          "hasConsoleAccess": { "type": "boolean" },
          "id": { "type": "string" },
          "languageId": { "type": "string" },
          "lastLoginDate": { "type": "number" },
          "lastLoginIP": { "type": "string" },
          "lastName": { "type": "string" },
          "male": { "type": "boolean" },
          "middleName": { "type": "null" },
          "modificationDate": { "type": "number" },
          "name": { "type": "string" },
          "nickname": { "type": "null" },
          "passwordExpirationDate": { "type": "null" },
          "passwordExpired": { "type": "boolean" },
          "passwordReset": { "type": "boolean" },
          "requestPassword": { "type": "boolean" },
          "timeZoneId": { "type": "string" },
          "type": { "type": "string" },
          "userId": { "type": "string" }
        }
      }
    },
    "errors": { "type": "array" },
    "i18nMessagesMap": { "type": "object" },
    "messages": { "type": "array" },
    "pagination": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "currentPage": { "type": "number" },
        "perPage": { "type": "number" },
        "totalEntries": { "type": "number" }
      }
    },
    "permissions": { "type": "array" }
  }
}
```

item.name: Get Users Include Anon and Exclude Default User

request.description:
### GET /api/v1/users/filter

This endpoint retrieves a list of users based on specified filter criteria.

#### Request

- Method: GET
- URL: `{{serverURL}}/api/v1/users/filter`
- Query Parameters:
    - per_page (integer, optional): Number of users per page.
    - includeanonymous (boolean, optional): Flag to include anonymous users.
    - includedefault (boolean, optional): Flag to include default users.

#### Response

The response is in JSON format and follows the schema below:

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "entity": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "active": { "type": "boolean" },
          "actualCompanyId": { "type": "string" },
          "additionalInfo": { "type": "object" },
          "admin": { "type": "boolean" },
          "backendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "birthday": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "comments": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "companyId": { "type": "string" },
          "createDate": { "type": "number" },
          "deleteDate": { "type": ["number", "null"] },
          "deleteInProgress": { "type": "boolean" },
          "emailAddress": { "type": "string" },
          "failedLoginAttempts": { "type": "integer" },
          "female": { "type": "boolean" },
          "firstName": { "type": "string" },
          "frontendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "fullName": { "type": "string" },
          "gravitar": { "type": "string" },
          "hasConsoleAccess": { "type": "boolean" },
          "id": { "type": "string" },
          "languageId": { "type": "string" },
          "lastLoginDate": { "type": "number" },
          "lastLoginIP": { "type": "string" },
          "lastName": { "type": "string" },
          "male": { "type": "boolean" },
          "middleName": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "modificationDate": { "type": "number" },
          "name": { "type": "string" },
          "nickname": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "passwordExpirationDate": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "passwordExpired": { "type": "boolean" },
          "passwordReset": { "type": "boolean" },
          "timeZoneId": { "type": "string" },
          "type": { "type": "string" },
          "userId": { "type": "string" }
        },
        "required": [
          "active",
          "admin",
          "backendUser",
          "companyId",
          "createDate",
          "deleteInProgress",
          "emailAddress",
          "failedLoginAttempts",
          "female",
          "firstName",
          "frontendUser",
          "fullName",
          "gravitar",
          "hasConsoleAccess",
          "id",
          "languageId",
          "lastLoginDate",
          "lastLoginIP",
          "lastName",
          "male",
          "modificationDate",
          "name",
          "passwordExpired",
          "passwordReset",
          "timeZoneId",
          "type",
          "userId"
        ]
      }
    },
    "errors": { "type": "array" },
    "i18nMessagesMap": { "type": "object" },
    "messages": { "type": "array" },
    "pagination": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "currentPage": { "type": "integer" },
        "perPage": { "type": "integer" },
        "totalEntries": { "type": "integer" }
      }
    },
    "permissions": { "type": "array" }
  },
  "required": ["entity", "errors", "i18nMessagesMap", "messages", "pagination", "permissions"]
}

 ```

item.name: Get Users Exclude Anon and Default User

request.description:
### API Request Description

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of users with filtering options. The request includes query parameters for pagination, and filtering options to exclude anonymous and default users.

### Request Body

This request does not contain a request body.

### Response Body

The response is in JSON format and represents an array of user entities. Each user entity contains various attributes such as active status, company ID, admin status, user details, login information, and permissions. Additionally, the response includes error messages, internationalization messages, pagination details, and permissions.

### JSON Schema

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "entity": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "active": { "type": "boolean" },
          "actualCompanyId": { "type": "string" },
          "additionalInfo": { "type": "object" },
          "admin": { "type": "boolean" },
          "backendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "birthday": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "comments": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "companyId": { "type": "string" },
          "createDate": { "type": "number" },
          "deleteDate": { "type": ["number", "null"] },
          "deleteInProgress": { "type": "boolean" },
          "emailAddress": { "type": "string" },
          "emailaddress": { "type": "string" },
          "failedLoginAttempts": { "type": "number" },
          "female": { "type": "boolean" },
          "firstName": { "type": "string" },
          "frontendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
          "fullName": { "type": "string" },
          "gravitar": { "type": "string" },
          "hasConsoleAccess": { "type": "boolean" },
          "id": { "type": "string" },
          "languageId": { "type": "string" },
          "lastLoginDate": { "type": "number" },
          "lastLoginIP": { "type": "string" },
          "lastName": { "type": "string" },
          "male": { "type": "boolean" },
          "middleName": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "modificationDate": { "type": "number" },
          "name": { "type": "string" },
          "nickname": { "type": ["string", "null"] },
          "passwordExpirationDate": { "type": ["number", "null"] },
          "passwordExpired": { "type": "boolean" },
          "passwordReset": { "type": "boolean" },
          "timeZoneId": { "type": "string" },
          "type": { "type": "string" },
          "userId": { "type": "string" }
        },
        "required": [
          "active",
          "admin",
          "backendUser",
          "companyId",
          "createDate",
          "deleteInProgress",
          "emailAddress",
          "emailaddress",
          "failedLoginAttempts",
          "female",
          "firstName",
          "frontendUser",
          "fullName",
          "gravitar",
          "hasConsoleAccess",
          "id",
          "languageId",
          "lastLoginDate",
          "lastLoginIP",
          "lastName",
          "male",
          "modificationDate",
          "name",
          "passwordExpired",
          "passwordReset",
          "timeZoneId",
          "type",
          "userId"
        ]
      }
    },
    "errors": { "type": "array" },
    "i18nMessagesMap": { "type": "object" },
    "messages": { "type": "array" },
    "pagination": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "currentPage": { "type": "number" },
        "perPage": { "type": "number" },
        "totalEntries": { "type": "number" }
      },
      "required": ["currentPage", "perPage", "totalEntries"]
    },
    "permissions": { "type": "array" }
  },
  "required": ["entity", "errors", "i18nMessagesMap", "messages", "pagination", "permissions"]
}

 ```

The API returns a JSON response with the following schema:

```json
{
    "entity": [
        {
            "active": "boolean",
            "actualCompanyId": "string",
            "additionalInfo": "object",
            "admin": "boolean",
            "backendUser": "boolean",
            "birthday": "null",
            "comments": "null",
            "companyId": "string",
            "createDate": "number",
            "deleteDate": "null",
            "deleteInProgress": "boolean",
            "emailAddress": "string",
            "emailaddress": "string",
            "failedLoginAttempts": "number",
            "female": "boolean",
            "firstName": "string",
            "frontendUser": "boolean",
            "fullName": "string",
            "gravitar": "string",
            "hasConsoleAccess": "boolean",
            "id": "string",
            "languageId": "string",
            "lastLoginDate": "number",
            "lastLoginIP": "string",
            "lastName": "string",
            "male": "boolean",
            "middleName": "null",
            "modificationDate": "number",
            "name": "string",
            "nickname": "null",
            "passwordExpirationDate": "null",
            "passwordExpired": "boolean",
            "passwordReset": "boolean",
            "timeZoneId": "string",
            "type": "string",
            "userId": "string"
        }
    ],
    "errors": [],
    "i18nMessagesMap": {},
    "messages": [],
    "pagination": {
        "currentPage": "number",
        "perPage": "number",
        "totalEntries": "number"
    },
    "permissions": []
}
```

### Retrieve Current User Information

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to `{{serverURL}}/api/v1/users/current` to retrieve the current user's information.

#### Request

No request body is required for this request.

#### Response

The response is in JSON format with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "admin": boolean,
    "email": string,
    "givenName": string,
    "loginAs": boolean,
    "roleId": string,
    "surname": string,
    "userId": string
}

 ```

- `admin`: Indicates if the user is an admin (boolean).
- `email`: User's email address (string).
- `givenName`: User's given name (string).
- `loginAs`: Indicates if the user is logged in (boolean).
- `roleId`: User's role ID (string).
- `surname`: User's surname (string).
- `userId`: User's ID (string).
    

The expected result is that the `loginAs` field should be `true`.

exec: pm.test("Errors array should be empty", function () {

request.description:
### Add Language

This endpoint allows you to add a new language with its corresponding country using the HTTP POST method.

#### Request Body

- `languageCode` (string, required): The code for the language.
- `countryCode` (string, required): The code for the country.
- `language` (string, required): The name of the language.
- `country` (string, required): The name of the country.
    

#### Response

Upon a successful execution, the server will respond with a status code of 200 and a JSON object containing the following fields:

- `entity`: An object containing the added language and country details, including their codes and IDs.
- `errors`: An array of any errors encountered during the request.
- `i18nMessagesMap`: An empty object for internationalization messages.
- `messages`: An array of messages related to the request.
- `pagination`: Null, as there is no pagination for this response.
- `permissions`: An array of permissions related to the request.

### Create User

This endpoint allows you to create a new user.

#### Request Body

- `userId` (string, optional): The unique identifier for the user.
- `active` (boolean, required): Indicates if the user is active.
- `firstName` (string, optional): The first name of the user.
- `middleName` (string, optional): The middle name of the user.
- `lastName` (string, optional): The last name of the user.
- `nickName` (string, optional): The nickname of the user.
- `email` (string, optional): The email address of the user.
- `male` (boolean, required): Indicates the gender of the user.
- `languageId` (string, optional): The language identifier for the user.
- `password` (array, required): The password for the user.
- `roles` (array, required): The roles assigned to the user.
    

#### Response Body (JSON Schema)

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "entity": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "user": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "active": { "type": "boolean" },
            "actualCompanyId": { "type": "string" },
            "additionalInfo": { "type": "null" },
            "admin": { "type": "boolean" },
            "backendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
            "birthday": { "type": "null" },
            "comments": { "type": "null" },
            "companyId": { "type": "string" },
            "createDate": { "type": "number" },
            "deleteDate": { "type": "null" },
            "deleteInProgress": { "type": "boolean" },
            "emailAddress": { "type": "string" },
            "emailaddress": { "type": "string" },
            "failedLoginAttempts": { "type": "number" },
            "female": { "type": "boolean" },
            "firstName": { "type": "string" },
            "frontendUser": { "type": "boolean" },
            "fullName": { "type": "string" },
            "gravitar": { "type": "string" },
            "hasConsoleAccess": { "type": "boolean" },
            "id": { "type": "string" },
            "languageId": { "type": "string" },
            "lastLoginDate": { "type": "null" },
            "lastLoginIP": { "type": "null" },
            "lastName": { "type": "string" },
            "male": { "type": "boolean" },
            "middleName": { "type": "string" },
            "modificationDate": { "type": "number" },
            "name": { "type": "string" },
            "nickname": { "type": "string" },
            "passwordExpirationDate": { "type": "null" },
            "passwordExpired": { "type": "boolean" },
            "passwordReset": { "type": "boolean" },
            "timeZoneId": { "type": "string" },
            "type": { "type": "string" },
            "userId": { "type": "string" }
          }
        },
        "userID": { "type": "string" }
      }
    },
    "errors": { "type": "array" },
    "i18nMessagesMap": { "type": "object" },
    "messages": { "type": "array" },
    "pagination": { "type": "null" },
    "permissions": { "type": "array" }
  }
}

 ```

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Length of First Name provided exceeds the maximum limit 100");

request.description:
This call validates if you are able to are able to create a user with more than 100 chars in the user name filed  
  
POST /api/v1/users

This endpoint is used to create a new user.

#### Request

The request should be sent as a JSON object in the request body with the following parameters:

- `active` (boolean, required): Indicates if the user is active.
- `firstName` (string, optional): The first name of the user.
- `lastName` (string, optional): The last name of the user.
- `email` (string, optional): The email address of the user.
- `password` (array, required): An array containing the password of the user.
    

#### Response

Upon sending the request, the server will respond with a status code of 400 and a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "message": {
            "type": "string"
        }
    }
}

 ```

The `message` property in the response contains a description of the error encountered during the request.

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Length of Middle Name provided exceeds the maximum limit 100");

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Length of Nick Name provided exceeds the maximum limit 100");

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Length of Birthday provided exceeds the maximum limit 100");

### Create User

``` json
            "passwordReset": { "type": "boolean" },
            "timeZoneId": { "type": "string" },
            "type": { "type": "string" },
            "userId": { "type": "string" }
          }
        },
        "userID": { "type": "string" }
      }
    },
    "errors": { "type": "array" },
    "i18nMessagesMap": { "type": "object" },
    "messages": { "type": "array" },
    "pagination": { "type": "null" },
    "permissions": { "type": "array" }
  }
}

 ```
